summary: The Colorful Spell & Magic Weapon Package.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5527/9107862774_6c0dc3539d_o.png[/img][center][youtube]3y6WIDaZMHg[/youtube]
[size=5]Ver1.2 Demo Video[/size][/center]

[youtube]2vBVHsa_jpE[/youtube] [youtube]GuP2szjwAA4[/youtube]

[heading]Preface[/heading]
Sorry.I don't speak English. I'm relying on machine translation.
Please forgive my poor English.

----

[b][color=#00ffff][size=4]It's been a long time...[/size][/color][/b][b]
[/b][b]I am sorry that I did not notice many emails.

I can not update MODs anymore.
and, I do not have a special edition, I cannot support you.

If you remodel my MODs and want to show it,
You do not need my permission. Please use it freely.
But ColorfulMagic uses a resource of other MOD a lot so many.
Please write all credit.
[/b]
---

I’m sorry for being late.
Thank you for following me.

ありがとう 2018/02/03


[u]Version　1.22[/u]
Normal Edtion was buggy...therefore I deleted it.
Instead, I added whiterun edition and winterhold edition.
To avoid conflict, I changed the location of the Darksoldier.


[color=red][heading]Features[/heading][/color]


This mod adds over 345 new, totally unique spells more than forty equally unique enemies, and a few magical items for the magic user.
Most of the new spells are destruction, which are very flashy and powerful.

You can buy most of these as spell books from a mod added vendor and some of the unique items can be obtained by defeating the new, mod specific enemies!



[heading]Installation[/heading]

[size=5][u][b][color=red]Warning!![/color][/b][/u][/size][u][b]
[/b][size=4]ver 1.26 is required DLC1 Dawnguard and DLC3 Dragonborn!![/size][/u]


Three versions exist in Colorful Magic 1.22.
You choose either favorite one, and, please install it.

[color=#ffd966][b]Whiterun Edition[/b][/color]
[color=#3c78d8][color=#efefef]This Edition adds  50 enemies and new followers.
[color=#3c78d8][color=#efefef]Merchants will be placed in [/color][/color][/color][/color]Under the eaves of Arcadia's Cauldron

[color=#3c78d8][color=#9fc5e8][b]Winterhold Edition[/b][/color]
[color=#efefef]This Edition adds  50 enemies and new followers.
Merchants will be placed in Winterhold.[/color][/color]

[color=#6aa84f][b]Simplified edition[/b][/color]
This edition is an extremely simple version not to add a enemy and follower to.
The thing related to craft is not added.
Merchant is placed in Arcadia's Cauldron.

[color=#b4a7d6][b]Darkside Edition
[/b][/color][color=#3c78d8][color=#efefef]This Edition are not adding Followers. Instead, they are added as an enemy.[/color][/color]
And this edition only, enemies respawn.(However, there is the enemy who does not respawn.)
Merchant is placed in Arcadia's Cauldron.

[color=#ff7700][size=3][i]Low Powerd ESP File[/i][/size][/color][color=#ff7700]
[/color]This is the Esp File which lowers the power of the Spell.　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　
After having installed a main file, You choose one from this, and, please overwrite.

[u][b]When updating from old version. [/b][/u]
[color=#e06666][color=#efefef]First, please try to overwrite install.
If there are any problems, please install it after a clean save.[/color][/color][b]
[/b]
[u][b]When meshes,textures is not displayed[/b][/u]

Please confirm the hierarchy of the folder.
[color=#80ff80]Data/meshes/magic03[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Data/Textures/effects03[/color]

[color=red][u][b]!!!When you update or uninstall!!![/b][/u][/color]
You must exclude aquamarine from the equipment.
And, please perform uninstallation / deletion after confirming that you was not stand on water.



[heading]Known Bugs & Issues[/heading]
[s]Lightning Teleportation does not work normally.[/s]　Fixed in the 1.251 update
[s]CTD near the Dwarven Destroyer.[/s]　Fixed in the 1.23 update
[s]Regenerate is not displayed in a list of magic.[/s]Fixed in the 1.11 update
[s]When have "Elemental Potency", some summonses fail.[/s]Fixed in the 1.01 update
Soul Taker is buggy,It may sometimes CTD.
When there is not an enemy near, Bahamut does not work normally.
[s]Texture of sun knight cloak is not displayed normally[/s]Fixed in the 1.12 update
[s]The problem that the sound of the firewall is not removed.[/s]Fixed in the 1.13 update
[s]When a player has "Elemental Potancy", bahamut summons fails.[/s]Fixed in the 1.14 update
[s]Bug of Magica regen of Thunder Enchant[/s]Fixed in the 1.14 update
[s]The problem that there was not an incantation book of earth rune and wind tharll[/s]　Fixed in the 1.14 update
[b]The problem that waterwalking is not removed
This problem will be resolved by the console command.

Player.setav waterwalking 0[/b]

(In the case of me, it was settled in Player.setav waterwalking -1)


[color=#f4f4f4][size=5][u]Bound Weapons CTD Bug[/u]
[size=3]You can fix this problem by using the console command.
Player.ResetInventory
[/size][/size][/color][color=#d5a6bd][color=#f4f4f4]or
[size=5][size=3]Player.RecycleActor[/size][/size][/color]
[/color]

[heading]Locations[/heading]



[size=150][color=#e0e000]1.26 Merchant Location[/color][/size]
[size=100][/size]

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3877/14703080317_826df847d9_o.jpg[/img]
[b]Whiterun Arcadia's Cauldron under the eaves
or
Winterhold[/b]


Merchant NPC Name : Pastel
She sells spell books and scrolls of this MOD.

Merchant NPC Name : Conte
He sells magic items of this MOD.
[b]
 [/b]
[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8620/16314681341_d982bd4f7f_o.png[/img]
[b]
Whiterun Arcadia's Cauldron [/b]

Merchant NPC Name : [color=White]Charcoal[/color]
SImplified Edition : He sells All spell books and scrolls of this MOD.
Darkside Edition   : He sells spell books and scrolls of this MOD.

Merchant NPC Name : Ink
SImplified Edition : She sells All Magic Item of this MOD.
Darkside Edition   : She sells magic items of this MOD.

[size=3][b][color=#DAA520]You can Create the Unique Item in Palette's Alchemy Table and Golden Anvil.

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3860/14847715374_1f9cae88bb_o.png[/img]
[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5576/14703259478_28635cbf35_o.png[/img]
[/color]


These are present in the vicinity of the merchant.[/b][/size][b]

These two are not added in the Simplified edition.[/b]



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------





[size=150][color=#e000e0]Enemy Locations[/color][/size]
[size=100][/size]

There are fifty enemies, all which are a unique item, or items.
If you defeat an enemy, you are able to loot the body for the enemies items, but beware, for the enemies are strong. Luckily, each enemy also has a elemental weakness, (fire, ice, shock, poison etc)

[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5570/14703182180_4299358a71_o.jpg[/img]

You can learn/unlearn 6 shouts at there.
Required word power.

Mega Flare
”yol” ”toor” ”shul”

Lightning Breath 
”Strun” ”Bah” ”Quo”

Poison Breath
”Krii” ”Lun” ”Aus”

Freeze Time
”Tiid” ”Klo” ”Ul”

Meteor Storm Call
”Strun” ”[i]Bah[/i]” ”[i]Toor[/i]”

Burst Voice
”[i]Fus[/i]” ”Ro” ”[i]Da[/i]”

Recover
”[i]Health[/i]” ”Stamina” ”[i]Magicka[/i]”

[b]Location : [b] [b]Editor Smoke Test Cell[/b][/b] [/b]

All items that are included in this MOD contains in this chest.
Please use the console command to go to qasmoke.

coc qasmoke

To come back

coc whiterun
